name: Laika: A Space-Dog Oddyssey
description:
These are the voyages of the bravest  space cadet: Laika. 

Unexpectedly, during her mission to boldly go where no dog has gone before, she ended up crash landing on an alien planet. And with no apparent way home, she is gonna need as much help as she can get. Yes, it means she needs YOU.

Explore a whole new world and meet it's weird and wacky inhabitants. Dig up some old coins, jump around the forest, solve ancient puzzles and make as much noise as you can. After all, in space no one can hear you bark.

Credits:  Daniil Skrendo, Ekaterina Smirnova, Julia Cieślicka, Bartosz Przybyłek, Oskar Bieńko, Bartosz Budka.
